metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16375 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 7.0.x through7.0.11, and Community Edition 5.0.x through 5.0.37 and 6.0.x through6.0.22. An attacker who is logged in as an agent or customer user withappropriate permissions can create a carefully crafted string containingmalicious JavaScript code as an article body. This malicious code isexecuted when an agent composes an answer to the original article.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16375` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.23-2
otrs2 - 6.0.23-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.23-2').
